review: Awesome! Very fast! The iphone app controller is cool as well. This is much faster than the Chromecast that i use on my downstairs tv. I am very surprosed about the speed of the GUI and ease of use. IF you buy this, you will not be disappointed!

review: Bought early, did not even work. Spent hours on phone with 3 reps who said customers had similar problems and I should return it. Plugged into TV with no signal. Was told I can return it at my pre-order discount price and buy again when its available in future at full price! Don't waste your time, use Amazon to buy things but not if they make it, go with Google Chromecast - its simple and works.
